about_the_game:
The official Soundtrack of Geo contains the following tracks:

1 - The Singularity
2 - Wave Particle
3 - Photoelectric
4 - Signal Drift
5 - Test Particle
6 - Kelvin
7 - Inertial Frame
8 - Convection
9 - Parallax Motion
10 - Viscus Matter
11 - The Plains of Aeolis
12 - Continuum
13 - Planetary Alignment
14 - Plank Length
15 - Displacement
16 - Exothermic
17 - Event Horizon
18 - Event Horizon
19 - Soular Flare
20 - Copernican Principle
21 - Entropy
22 - Faraday Constant
23 - Escape Velocity
24 - Atmospheric

Super smooth audio caviar for your listening pleasure!

Soundtrack supplied in MP3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Storage: 288 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Ability to play MP3 files
